column5: Even though I've been to the cottage a few times so far this year, I had tonsss of work to do, but the long weekend was sooooo nice I had to get away with my bud and get a line in the water, we only caught a few small pike and a few bass, but it felt soooooo good. The fish in pic is nothing to write home about but it felt good to be back fishing again, looking forward to a great year in my slice of heaven!
Always good to get out for the first time. TFS

That is exactly what fishing is all about!  Well said!  Nice to see you managed to put aside the chores for a little enjoyment.  Cottages sometimes absorb all your quality time in heaven with tasks.  Enjoy your piece of paradise.  Cheers,  Jen
